title: Varus's Q goes through Sivir's spell shield;
body: Watching Dignitas versus Team Liquid and at 19:50 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RKWK53ZU4PY) Varus's Q damages Sivir through her spell shield.

replies.body: I have had this on a few games quite a while ago. I play Sivir a lot, so I know how to spell shield, and I was up against a Lucian and every time he would use a spell or his support would or in a team fight I would block it and get the mana back but the dmg still sent through.. somehow. .. it was like just randomly riot got mixed up and set the spell shield to morganas shield that only stops disables and things like that. fortunately it hasn't happens since then :)
